hero.name: Syed Mahedi Hasen
hero.subtitle: I am a full-stack developer with a passion for problem-solving and a track record of delivering high-quality software solutions. I also have good skill in Video Making & Editing! Now I'm studing at Rajshahi university of Engineering & Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm a developer and problem solver with expertise in Python, C++, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. I enjoy collaborating with teams to tackle complex challenges and stay up-to-date with industry trends. Check out my portfolio to see some of the exciting projects I've worked on.
about.secondary: When I'm not coding, I enjoy traveling to new destinations and capturing my adventures on video. I have a keen eye for storytelling and enjoy creating engaging content that inspires people to explore the world.

work.describtion: Assalamu Alaikum. These projects demonstrate my skills and expertise across various domains. Take a glimpse into my world of creativity and innovation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!

achievements1.describtion: Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology
